subject: docs(claude): add commit message format guidelines
body:
Add structured commit message format to Code Standards section
in CLAUDE.md, requiring metadata footers (Tags, Complexity,
Urgency, Impact, Risk, Debt, Epic, Semver) on every commit.

Tags: docs, standards, process
Complexity: 1
Urgency: 2
Impact: internal
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: commit-guidelines
Semver: patch

https://claude.ai/code/session_0122KmE3S6QkgjX3CL5ArKPs
title: add commit message format guidelines
